20110121023514.000|20110121023515.000|CC1|RIGHT UP ON THAT.

20110121023521.000|20110121023524.000|CC1|>> NOT SO MUCH ANY MORE.        
20110121023524.000|20110121023528.000|CC1|I MEAN HE'S A BAD GUY.          
20110121023528.000|20110121023529.000|CC1|WE'VE SEEN THAT IN A LOT OF     
20110121023529.000|20110121023531.000|CC1|OTHER WAYS SINCE THEN.          
20110121023531.000|20110121023532.000|CC1|BUT IT WAS -- IT WASN'T AS      
20110121023532.000|20110121023533.000|CC1|PERSONAL WITH ME.

20110121023534.000|20110121023535.000|CC1|THEY WENT IN THERE AND TOOK OVER
20110121023535.000|20110121023537.000|CC1|THIS OTHER COUNTRY.             
20110121023537.000|20110121023539.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, I THINK IT WAS     
20110121023539.000|20110121023540.000|CC1|APPROPRIATE TO USE ALL THE      
20110121023540.000|20110121023541.000|CC1|ARGUMENTS, BECAUSE WE WERE DOING
20110121023541.000|20110121023543.000|CC1|THE RIGHT THING.                
20110121023543.000|20110121023546.000|CC1|AND SO THERE'S NOTHING WRONG

20110121023547.000|20110121023551.000|CC1|OR USING AN ARGUMENT ABOUT HOW  
20110121023551.000|20110121023552.000|CC1|THIS GUY WAS, HOW HE BRUTALIZED 
20110121023552.000|20110121023555.000|CC1|HIS OWN PEOPLE AND THE PEOPLE OF
20110121023555.000|20110121023556.000|CC1|KUWAIT USING MORALITY ARGUMENTS.
20110121023556.000|20110121023558.000|CC1|USE THEM ALL, BECAUSE WE WERE   
20110121023558.000|20110121023600.000|CC1|DOING THE RIGHT THING.          
20110121023600.000|20110121023604.000|CC1|>> MR. PRESIDENT, THE DECISION  
20110121023604.000|20110121023607.000|CC1|TO END THE WAR WHERE YOU DID    
20110121023607.000|20110121023607.000|CC1|WHEN YOU DID, TELL US ABOUT     
20110121023607.000|20110121023609.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110121023609.000|20110121023610.000|CC1|>> WELL, WE HAD AN OBJECTIVE.   
20110121023610.000|20110121023611.000|CC1|THE OBJECTIVE WAS TO KICK THIS  
20110121023611.000|20110121023615.000|CC1|GUY OUT OF KUWAIT.              
20110121023615.000|20110121023618.000|CC1|AND WE DID IT.                  
20110121023618.000|20110121023619.000|CC1|AND WE FORMED A COALITION TO    
20110121023619.000|20110121023622.000|CC1|HELP ACHIEVE THAT.              
20110121023622.000|20110121023624.000|CC1|AND SO IT DIDN'T ENTER MY MIND  
20110121023624.000|20110121023625.000|CC1|THAT WE OUGHT TO DO MORE, THAT  
20110121023625.000|20110121023627.000|CC1|WE OUGHT TO GO ON FURTHER.      
20110121023627.000|20110121023627.000|CC1|NOW WE'RE IN CHARGE, WE OUGHT TO
20110121023627.000|20110121023629.000|CC1|KILL HIM.                       
20110121023629.000|20110121023630.000|CC1|THAT WASN'T THE OBJECTIVE AND   
20110121023630.000|20110121023632.000|CC1|THAT WASN'T THE WAY IN WHICH HE 
20110121023632.000|20110121023634.000|CC1|FORMED AN UNPRECEDENTED         
20110121023634.000|20110121023638.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL COALITION.        
20110121023638.000|20110121023639.000|CC1|SO WHEN PEOPLE CAME TO ME AND   
20110121023639.000|20110121023640.000|CC1|SAID "IT'S OVER, WE WON," THAT  
20110121023640.000|20110121023641.000|CC1|WAS FINE.

20110121023642.000|20110121023643.000|CC1|>> DID ANY OF THE GENTLEMEN AT  
20110121023643.000|20110121023644.000|CC1|THIS TABLE ADVOCATE GOING       
20110121023644.000|20110121023647.000|CC1|FURTHER?                        
20110121023647.000|20110121023651.000|CC1|TO BAGHDAD, TO SADDAM?          
20110121023651.000|20110121023652.000|CC1|WERE YOU PRESENT WHEN ANYONE OF 
20110121023652.000|20110121023653.000|CC1|SENIOR RANK DID?                
20110121023653.000|20110121023653.000|CC1|>> NO.                          
20110121023653.000|20110121023654.000|CC1|>> NO ONE DID.                  
20110121023654.000|20110121023656.000|CC1|>> AND MR. VICE PRESIDENT, OF   
20110121023656.000|20110121023657.000|CC1|COURSE THIS THINGS US TO ONE OF 
20110121023657.000|20110121023659.000|CC1|MANY ELEPHANTS HERE IN THIS

20110121023701.000|20110121023704.000|CC1|OR FALSE, QUESTION YOU'VE       
20110121023704.000|20110121023707.000|CC1|ANSWERED BEFORE, THE WAY GULF   
20110121023707.000|20110121023708.000|CC1|WAR ONE WAS EXECUTED AND WHEN   
20110121023708.000|20110121023711.000|CC1|AND WHERE IT STOPPED, LED ALMOST
20110121023711.000|20110121023717.000|CC1|BY DEFINITION, TO GULF WAR TWO. 
20110121023717.000|20110121023718.000|CC1|>> WELL, I GUESS I WOULD TAKE   
20110121023718.000|20110121023720.000|CC1|EXCEPTION TO THAT, BRIAN.       
20110121023720.000|20110121023722.000|CC1|WE WERE -- A LOT OF THE ADVICE  
20110121023722.000|20110121023725.000|CC1|WE GOT WHEN WE GOT THROUGH GULF 
20110121023725.000|20110121023726.000|CC1|WAR ONE WAS THAT SADDAM HUSSEIN 
20110121023726.000|20110121023727.000|CC1|WOULD NEVER BE ABLE TO SURVIVE  
20110121023727.000|20110121023729.000|CC1|THAT KIND OF DEFEAT.            
20110121023729.000|20110121023732.000|CC1|HE DID.                         
20110121023732.000|20110121023736.000|CC1|>> DID YOU TRY TO FERMENT       
20110121023736.000|20110121023736.000|CC1|ANYTHING FROM INSIDE?           
20110121023736.000|20110121023737.000|CC1|ANY REAL ATTEMPT MADE TO DO     
20110121023737.000|20110121023738.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20110121023738.000|20110121023739.000|CC1|>> NO, I DON'T THINK SO.

20110121025446.000|20110121025446.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110121025446.000|20110121025448.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110121025448.000|20110121025448.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110121025448.000|20110121025451.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110121025451.000|20110121025452.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20110121025452.000|20110121025452.000|CC1|  Tell your doctor if you have  
20110121025452.000|20110121025454.000|CC1|        a heart condition       
20110121025454.000|20110121025454.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20110121025454.000|20110121025457.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20110121025457.000|20110121025457.000|CC1|     If you're still having     
20110121025457.000|20110121025459.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,     
20110121025459.000|20110121025500.000|CC1|         take the lead.         
20110121025500.000|20110121025500.000|CC1|       Ask your doctor if       
20110121025500.000|20110121025503.000|CC1|        including ADVAIR        
20110121025503.000|20110121025503.000|CC1|       could help improve       
20110121025503.000|20110121025504.000|CC1|       your lung function.      
20110121025504.000|20110121025504.000|CC1|         Get your first         
20110121025504.000|20110121025507.000|CC1|     full prescription free     
20110121025507.000|20110121025507.000|CC1|     and save on refills at     
20110121025507.000|20110121025531.000|CC1|         ADVAIRcopd.com.
